data.text: “Muntie eyi, Yakobfifo
mo a mofrɛ mo ho kurow kronkron no mma
Mehyɛɛ nneɛma a atwa mu no ho nkɔm dedaada,
Na minim sɛnea moyɛ asoɔden fa
Enti, mekaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ mo dedaada
Moate eyinom nyinaa; monhwɛ wɔn nyinaa.
Afei na wɔayɛ koraa, ɛnkyɛe;
Wontee, na wontee ase;
Me din nti metwentwɛn mʼabufuw so;
Hwɛ mahoa mo ho, ɛnyɛ sɛnea wɔnan dwetɛ ho;
Me nti, me nti, na meyɛ eyi.
“Tie me, Yakob,
Me ara me nsa na ɛtoo asase fapem,
“Mo nyinaa mommɔ mu mmra mmetie:
Me, me na makasa.
“Montwiw mmɛn me na muntie eyi:
Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Sɛ mudii mʼahyɛde so a,
Anka mo asefo ayɛ sɛ nwea,
Mumfi Babilonia,
Osukɔm anne wɔn bere a odii wɔn anim, wɔ nweatam ahorow so no,
“Asomdwoe nni hɔ mma amumɔyɛfo.” Sɛɛ na Awurade se.
